item.title: The Andes Plane Crash Survivors Had to Make an Unthinkable Choice
item.description: In 1972, a plane carrying a Uruguayan rugby team crashed in the Andes. After weeks stranded with little food, survivors faced an unthinkable choice to stay alive. Their story is one of tragedy and resilience.

media:content.media:title: The Andes Plane Crash Survivors Had to Make an Unthinkable Choice
media:content.media:description: In 1972, a plane carrying a Uruguayan rugby team crashed in the Andes. After weeks stranded with little food, survivors faced an unthinkable choice to stay alive. Their story is one of tragedy and resilience.

item.title: How Did Gary Farris End Up on the Burn Pile?
item.description: In 2018, Gary Farris's remains were found on a burn pile on his Georgia farm. A jury convicted his wife, Melody Farris, after phone data showed his cellphone—and presumably his body—was moved alone by her.

item.title: The Heartbreaking Disappearance of 19-Year-Old Kadin Black
item.description: The Heartbreaking Disappearance of 19-Year-Old Kadin Black

item.title: Cold Case Solved: April Tinsley’s Murderer Found
item.description: April Tinsley, 8, was abducted and murdered in 1988 in Indiana. After decades of taunting notes and leads, forensic genealogy in 2018 identified and convicted John Miller—justice finally served.

item.title: Jason Dalton: From Ride‑Share to Rampage
item.description: In 2016, Uber driver Jason Brian Dalton went on a shooting spree across Kalamazoo, Michigan—killing six strangers and injuring two. He later pleaded guilty and received multiple life sentences

item.title: The Strange UFO Experience Of Travis Walton
item.description: The Strange UFO Experience Of Travis Walton

item.title: The Mystery Of A Boy In A Box
item.description: The Mystery Of A Boy In A Box

item.title: Life360 App Helped Law Enforcement In Solving A Horrible Case
item.description: In 2024, 13-year-old Savannah Copeland was found dead after going missing. Her dad’s use of Life360 helped lead authorities to her location—and the suspect now faces charges

item.title: Michele Williams: Lies, Intruder, or Murder?
item.description: Michele Williams Can’t Keep Her Lies Straight

item.title: Pregnant Teen's Body Was Discovered Half A Mile From Home
item.description: Sixteen-year-old Mia Campos, eight months pregnant, was found dead in a wooded area near her Georgia home in July 2024. Her ex-boyfriend now faces multiple charges including murder and feticide.

item.title: Elizabeth Holmes: The Theranos Deception Unveiled
item.description: Elizabeth Holmes rose to fame as the visionary behind Theranos, only to be convicted in 2022 for defrauding investors. This video traces the rise, fall, and scandal that shook Silicon Valley.

item.title: Mystery of Blair Adams: Road Trip Ends in Murder
item.description: In 1996, Blair Adams abruptly left Canada, crisscrossed the U.S., and was found beaten to death near Knoxville, Tennessee—surrounded by cash and valuables. His murder remains unsolved.

item.title: Classmate Ends Beloved Nursing Student’s Life Over Rejection
item.description: A promising nursing student’s life was tragically cut short after a classmate reacted violently to rejection, leaving a community in shock.

item.title: The Zizian Cult And Their Ties To Six People Who Lost Their Lives
item.description: Exploring the disturbing connections between the Zizian cult and six lives lost, uncovering a story of control, loyalty, and tragedy.

item.title: The Heartbreaking Case Of Jennifer Dulos
item.description: Jennifer Dulos vanished in 2019, leaving behind a trail of troubling evidence. Her case remains a poignant reminder of the search for justice.

item.title: He was Sentenced to LIFE at only 11 YEARS OLD!
item.description: Jordan Brown was sentenced to life at 11 for murdering his pregnant stepmother. Years later, his conviction was overturned due to lack of evidence.

item.title: The Fitbit Alibi That Solved A Case
item.description: In 2016, Nicole VanderHeyden was found murdered in Wisconsin. Her boyfriend’s Fitbit data provided an unexpected alibi—and DNA led police to the true suspect, offering a breakthrough years later.

item.title: Are Cancer Vaccines And A Cure for Diabetes Within Our Grasp?
item.description: Are Cancer Vaccines And A Cure for Diabetes Within Our Grasp?

item.title: A YouTuber Disappeared After Trying to Find the "M Cave"
item.description: Kenny Veach vanished in 2014 while searching for the mysterious "M Cave" near Nellis Air Force Base. Despite searches, his fate remains unknown.

item.title: MISSING For MORE Than 20 YEARS!!!��
item.description: Five-month-old Sabrina Aisenberg vanished from her home in 1997. Decades later, her disappearance remains an unsolved mystery.
